name: The Coronation of the Virgin
description: The Coronation of the Virgin; Master of Evert Zoudenbalch (Dutch, active 3rd quarter of 15th century); Utrecht, Netherlands; about 1460; Tempera and gold leaf on parchment; Leaf: 16.4 x 11.7 cm (6 7/16 x 4 5/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 10, fol. 15v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Coronation of the Virgin
medium: Tempera and gold leaf on parchment
